content.rendered:
Rent/Lease Property

SERVICES Rent/Lease Property

Rent and Lease Luxury Properties in South Delhi without Any Hassles

Royale Realtors simplifies the property management process. Whether you’re looking for a property for rent, tenants for your property, or property management services, we have got you covered. We offer end-to-end property management services for landlords to help you seamlessly manage your residential and commercial properties with ease.

Let’s look at our rent/lease solutions.

Ours is one of the finest real estate management companies in Delhi. With rich experience in the trade, knowledge about each corner of Delhi, and a dedicated team of professional executives, we are proud to say that we are the Best Realtors in the town. Our Presence in Shanti Niketan Market, which is the heart of the diplomatic area, adds to our performance, credibility & approach.

We have ample real estate housing options to offer you, suiting all kinds of budgets or specific requirements, of your diplomats of various levels (Ambassador / Ministers / Counsellors / Secretaries / Attaches / Local Staff), channel partners, associates, and other related entities. We assure you best of the class real estate services will make your experience a memorable one.

We would feel proud to be associated with you. Just give us a chance to serve you.

It will be great if we can meet personally in your office with our company brochure and proposals for your required property listings, market trends, availabilities, and we can discuss it further to start a mutually benefitting long-term relationship.

Find Rental Properties

Whether you are a Foreigner working with an MNC, a Diplomat with Embassy, Expatriate with a Foreign Mission, or a reputed HNI client, When you move to a new place like South Delhi, finding a perfect rental property is the first thing you have in mind. There are myriad things to consider when looking for a rental property. You need to evaluate the location and neighborhood, amenities, schools,markets, nearby services, hospitals, upfront costs, and more. Many people who are in a rush overlook these factors and choose the wrong house and regret it later.

Our rental services help you find the right houses for rent without any hassles. All you need to do is contact us and discuss your requirements. We’ll find the best rental properties as per your needs and help you make the best choice. We also take care of all pre-moving and post-moving requirements, including:

Understand Your Needs

We understand your location requirements and the amenities you need.

Find Properties

We suggest the best properties as per your individual requirements.

Connect You with the Landlord

Once you shortlist a property, we connect you with the landlord so you can get familiar with them and understand their demands.

Handle Documentation

Lastly, we handle the rent agreement and other documentation, so you can seamlessly move into your new house.

Your Dream Luxury Home Is One Call Away

Contact Us

Property Leasing

Are you looking for the right tenant for your luxury residential property or commercial space in South Delhi ? Look no further, as Royale Realtors will get the job done for you. Many property owners prefer to rent out properties to generate a regular passive income. However, renting out a property comes with its challenges. You need to find tenants, conduct background checks, maintain your property, handle documentation, and more.

We take care of all these requirements, so you can have peace of mind. We fully manage your rental property, from cleaning to upkeep to regular fixes. You get complete visibility into every step of the rental process, including tenant details, documentation process, etc. We manage your rental property throughout the year.

Some key highlights of our residential property renting services are:

Dedicated property manager for each property

Property inspections and apartment upkeep

Tenant background check and rental advisory

Documentation and execution

Seamless transition with no hassles

We are the masters in leasing residential and commercial properties, as we are backed up with a strong channel, an exhaustive database of more than 1,35,000 properties, a team of qualified, dedicated professionals to serve you. Since we have a team of surveyors, we list the available properties in our database before any other realtor in town. We take every necessary step to right from identifying the place of your choice, guidance, and we aim at getting you the best deal. We assure you about our ability to judge your requirements and to provide your dream property, at the right location, at the right price, with the best of legal advice, fastest and honestly.

Our Renting Services include:

Free Pick up & Drop from your office/hotel/residence

Personalized assistance & approach

One Point Contact for all your real estate solutions

Listings of the properties before site visits on email

Timely coordinated properties with prior appointments, minimum waiting at the site

Transparent Negotiations to guarantee you the best deal

With u, for u, always……we help you in moving in, settling, and even at the time of the renewal of your lease.

Hire of Furniture, Air-Conditioners, Power Backup, White Goods & their Maintenance

Full Lease or Legal Paperwork, doorstep service

Photos on request
